about:
Boo! I'm here to spread spooky fun, and BloominDaisy made sure I'm filled with tricks and treats! 🎃

In this candy-filled adventure, you can steal candy from others, give treats to your friends, and even join the candy lottery!
Try your luck with these commands: `/trick` to try to nab candy, `/give_treat` to treat a friend, and `/buy_potion` to win big in the cauldron event!

More haunted surprises are on the way, so keep your eyes peeled! Got any ghostly feedback or need help? Contact BloominDaisy if you dare! 👻
